metadata.name: all the people who rushed
metadata.description:
chaos stone were changing color, even the golden winged Peng and the Son of the Light, also had a change of face.



Their bodies stopped, as if they were in a swamp.



The surrounding void flows slowly like water, as if there is an invisible force field, which solidifies everyone in the same place.



"Fools, do they really think it's that easy?"
